Reviews.Title: Fast shipping, and good fit for my 1/3" security camera.
Reviews.Author: Robert Young
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping.  This lens screwed right in my 1/3" security camera and focused nicely.  My camera originally had a 3.6 mm wide angle lens, and this long lens got my view up close and in focus.

ProductInfo.Features:
Product Name: CCTV Lens
Mount: 12 * 0.5mm; Aperture: F2.0
Image Format: 1/3"; Angle of View: 21 Angle
Size: 14 x 15mm(D*H); Weight: 5g
Package Content: 1 x 16mm CCTV Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Gino 1/3" CCTV 16mm Lens C25230for Security Box CCTV Camera Black
